pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: その物語は映画用に脚色された。
lessons.indonesian: The story was adapted for the movie.

lessons.japanese: この物語はテレビ用に脚色できるかもしれない。
lessons.indonesian: This story may be adaptable for a television program.

lessons.japanese: この小説は映画用に脚色された。
lessons.indonesian: The novel was adapted for a film.

lessons.japanese: この劇は小説から脚色したものです。
lessons.indonesian: This play was adapted from the novel.
